text: Hagi ana knama efore'ma hanigeno'a, Ra Anumzamo'a hankavenentake azana rusuteno, Agri vahe'ma osi'ama ofri'za Asiria moparegane, Isipine, Patrosine Kusi moparegane, Elamu moparegane, Sinari moparegane, Hamati moparegane, hageri amunompi me'nea moparegama umani'naza vahe'a ete mago'ane zamavareno nonkumazamire egahie.
